sen.j: スカイランドいこま、生駒山上遊園地（いこまさんじょうゆうえんち）とは、奈良県生駒市の生駒山の山上にある遊園地。
sen.e: Skyland Ikoma is a theme park located at the top of Mt. Ikoma in Ikoma City, Nara Prefecture.
Skyland Ikoma is a theme park located at the top of Mt. Ikoma in Ikoma City, Nara Prefecture.
Skyland Ikoma is a theme park located at the top of Mt. Ikoma in Ikoma City, Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 近畿日本鉄道の子会社である近鉄レジャーサービスが経営している（2004年までは、同年に解散した近鉄興業株式会社が運営）。
sen.e: It is operated by Kintetsu Leisure Service, a subsidiary of Kinki Nippon Railway Company (while it was under the management of Kintetsu Kogyo Kabushiki Gaisha until 2004 when that company was dissolved).

It is operated by Kintetsu Leisure Service, a subsidiary of Kinki Nippon Railway Company (while it was under the management of Kintetsu Kogyo Kabushiki Gaisha until 2004 when that company was dissolved).

It is operated by Kintetsu Leisure Service, a subsidiary of Kinki Nippon Railway Company (while it was under the management of Kintetsu Kogyo Kabushiki Gaisha until 2004 when that company was dissolved).

sen.j: 概要
sen.e: Summary
Summary
Summary

sen.j: 以前は入園料が必要だったが、現在は無料となっている。
sen.e: There used to be admission fees for Skyland Ikoma but it is free at present.
There used to be admission fees for Skyland Ikoma but it is free at present.
There used to be admission fees for Skyland Ikoma but it is free at present.

sen.j: 遊戯施設（ジェットコースターなど）の利用は従来どおり有料である。
sen.e: There are charges for rides (such as the rollercoaster) as in the past.
There are charges for rides (such as the roller coaster) as in the past.
There are charges for rides (such as the roller coaster) as in the past.

sen.j: また園内にある飛行塔は国内に現存する遊戯施設では最も古いものである。
sen.e: The airplane tower in this park is the oldest of the existing rides in Japan.
The airplane tower in this park is the oldest of the existing rides in Japan.
The airplane tower in this park is the oldest of the existing rides in Japan.

sen.j: 飛行塔は戦時中には防空監視所として使用された。
sen.e: The airplane tower was used as an air defense surveillance center during the war.
The airplane tower was used as an air defense surveillance center during the war.
The airplane tower was used as an air defense surveillance center during the war.

sen.j: 標高642mの生駒山からは大阪湾まで見渡せる夜景が美しいが、遊園地からは眺められる場所が少ない。
sen.e: At 642 meter elevation, the beautiful night view overlooking Osaka Bay stretches out from the top of Mt. Ikoma but there are not many places with view in Skyland Ikoma.
At 642 meter elevation, the beautiful night view overlooking Osaka Bay stretches out from the top of Mt. Ikoma but there are not many places with view in Skyland Ikoma.
At 642 meter elevation, the beautiful night view overlooking Osaka Bay stretches out from the top of Mt. Ikoma but there are not many places with view in Skyland Ikoma.

sen.j: 鉄道では、近畿日本鉄道生駒駅に接続する鳥居前駅からケーブルカー利用となる。
sen.e: To visit Skyland Ikoma by train, get off at Kintetsu Ikoma Station and transfer to a cable car at the connecting Toriimae Station.
To visit Skyland Ikoma by train, get off at Kintetsu Ikoma Station and transfer to a cable car at the connecting Toriimae Station.
To visit Skyland Ikoma by train, get off at Kintetsu Ikoma Station and transfer to a cable car at the connecting Toriimae Station.

sen.j: ケーブルカーは、動物やケーキの装飾がされている。
sen.e: Cable cars are decorated with paintings of animals and pastries.
Cable cars are decorated with paintings of animals and pastries.
Cable cars are decorated with paintings of animals and pastries.

sen.j: 2006年から園内の植栽に力を入れ、毎年花の数が増えている。
sen.e: Since 2006, strong efforts have been put into flora in the park and there have been more flowers every year.
Since 2006, strong efforts have been put into flora in the park and there have been more flowers every year.
Since 2006, strong efforts have been put into flora in the park and there have been more flowers every year.

sen.j: オンシーズンの土日･祝日等にはキャラクターショーが開催される。
sen.e: During the season when the park is open, various shows are organized on the weekends and statutory holidays.
During the season when the park is open, various shows are organized on the weekends and statutory holidays.
During the season when the park is open, various shows are organized on the weekends and statutory holidays.

sen.j: 園内には遊戯施設のほかに、「ペットふれあいの森」（別途料金が必要）がある。
sen.e: There is the 'Petting Park' (admission extra) in addition to the rides.
sen.cmt: ペットふれあいの森 ―定訳不明
sen.e: There is the 'Petting Park' (admission extra) in addition to the rides.
There is the 'Petting Park' (admission extra) in addition to the rides.
sen.cmt: 全角クォーテーションを半角に修正

sen.j: 犬や猫が放し飼いにされており、自由に触れ合うことができる。
sen.e: Dogs and cats are unrestrained and can be touched in the Petting Park.
Dogs and cats are unrestrained and can be touched in the Petting Park.
Dogs and cats are unrestrained and can be touched in the Petting Park.

sen.j: 2000年代以降は、ユニバーサル・スタジオ・ジャパン開業により利用客が激減し、2003年度から冬季に休園するが、大晦日から元日にかけて、年越しイベントを開催することもある。
sen.e: Subsequent to 2000, the number of visitors decreased sharply with the opening of the Universal Studio Japan forcing the park to close during the winter months since 2003 but the New Year's Eve event has been organized between December 31 and January 1 in some years.

Subsequent to 2000, the number of visitors decreased sharply with the opening of Universal Studios Japan, forcing the park to close during the winter months since 2003, but a New Year's Eve event has been organized between December 31 and January 1 in some years.

Subsequent to 2000, the number of visitors decreased sharply with the opening of Universal Studios Japan, forcing the park to close during the winter months since 2003, but a New Year's Eve event has been organized between December 31 and January 1 in some years.
sen.cmt: 全角アポストロフィーを半角に修正

sen.j: 園内は大阪府および奈良県にまたがっており、近鉄あやめ池遊園地や奈良ドリームランドが閉園した現在、奈良県内に残る遊園地はここだけである。
sen.e: Skyland Ikoma crosses over the border between Osaka and Nara prefectures and, with Kintetsu Ayameike Amusement Park and Nara Dreamland having closed their doors, it is the only theme park remaining in Nara Prefecture at present

Skyland Ikoma crosses over the border between Osaka and Nara prefectures and, with Kintetsu Ayameike Amusement Park and Nara Dreamland having closed their doors, it is the only theme park remaining in Nara Prefecture at present.

Skyland Ikoma crosses over the border between Osaka and Nara prefectures and, with Kintetsu Ayameike Amusement Park and Nara Dreamland having closed their doors, it is the only theme park remaining in Nara Prefecture at present.

sen.j: 園内には在阪テレビジョン放送局の生駒山テレビ・FM送信所（親局）の鉄塔が並んでいる。
sen.e: There are communications towers of television stations in Osaka and Mt. Ikoma TV FM Transmission Station (the parent station) in the park.
There are communications towers of television stations in Osaka and Mt. Ikoma TV FM Transmission Station (the parent station) in the park.
In the park, there are steel towers of Mt. Ikoma TV FM Transmission Station (the parent station) for television stations in Osaka.
sen.cmt: 原文の内容に沿うよう一部訳し直しました。

sen.j: 2007年冬季休園期間に、ウルトラツイスターとスカイループが解体された。
sen.e: In 2007, while the park was closed for the winter, Ultra Twister and Sky Loop were dismantled.
In 2007, while the park was closed for the winter, Ultra Twister and Sky Loop were dismantled.
In 2007, while the park was closed for the winter, Ultra Twister and Sky Loop were dismantled.

sen.j: ゴールデンウィークや9月の土・日・祝日は20時まで
sen.e: The park closes at 20:00 during the Golden Week as well as weekends and statutory holidays in September.
The park closes at 20:00 during Golden Week as well as weekends and statutory holidays in September.
The park closes at 20:00 during Golden Week as well as weekends and statutory holidays in September.

sen.j: 夏休み期間中は、21時ないし22時まで営業
sen.e: The park closes at 21:00 or 22:00 during the summer months.

The park is closed during the winter season (December 1 to mid-March. The park will be closed until March 16 for 2007.)
